channel.title: foresight newsletter on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in foresight newsletter on Paul Cutler

item.title: Foresight Newsletter Volume 2, Issue 1 out
item.description: After months of slacking on my part, I am proud to announce a new issue of the Foresight Newsletter is out. Now in to it’s second year, this issue gives an overview on the latest releases, including both 2.0.4 and 2.0, community news, a look back at the first Foresight User & Developer Conference, upcoming conferences, and other information. (Considering everything that’s happened, it could have been stuffed with news, but I really needed to push out a release and give myself a kick start).
